Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the film *Welcome Back* and its filming locations?
Options:
A. a) *Welcome Back* was shot inside the Emirates Palace.
B. b) *Welcome Back* is the first Bollywood film to be shot in the United Arab Emirates.
C. c) A significant part of *Welcome Back* was filmed in the United Arab Emirates.
D. d) The Emirates Palace is located in Abu Dhabi.
Answer: a) *Welcome Back* was shot inside the Emirates Palace. and c) A significant part of *Welcome Back* was filmed in the United Arab Emirates.
